# withUnsafeBytes(_:)

**Instance Method**

Read the buffer synchronously on the CPU. The buffer provided is only valid for the lifetime of the callback.

## Declaration

```swift
final func withUnsafeBytes(_ callback: (UnsafeRawBufferPointer) -> Void)
```
title: withUnsafeBytes(_:)
